publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-517 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Code of Conduct for Members—That the Parliament agrees to adopt the Code of Conduct for Members annexed to the 1st Report, 2000, of the Standards Committee; that the provisions of the code shall have immediate effect and shall apply to all Members, and that the code be printed and published for sale in hard copy and made available on the Parliament’s website.

S1M-517 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Code of Conduct for Members-That the Parliament agrees to adopt the Code of Conduct for Members annexed to the 1st Report, 2000, of the Standards Committee; that the provisions of the code shall have immediate effect and shall apply to all Members, and that the code be printed and published for sale in hard copy and made available on the Parliament's website.

S1M-517 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Code of Conduct for Members—That the Parliament agrees to adopt the Code of Conduct for Members annexed to the 1st Report, 2000, of the Standards Committee; that the provisions of the code shall have immediate effect and shall apply to all Members, and that the code be printed and published for sale in hard copy and made available on the Parliament’s website.
